proTips.description: Limit your CV to 2 pages maximum. Recruiters spend only 6-8 seconds on initial screening.

proTips.title: Use Action Verbs
proTips.description: Start bullet points with words like 'Managed,' 'Developed,' 'Increased,' 'Implemented.'

faqs.question: What formats can I download my CV in?
faqs.answer: You can download your CV as PDF (perfect for job applications), JSON (for future editing), or TXT format.
